desc: A sapphire stone shimmering with the essence of wisdom.
lore:
A sapphire stone shimmering with the essence of wisdom.

How you answer the statement "I am blue" reflects your personal wisdom. With sympathy—compassion. With affirmation through observation—intuition. And with a little tune—candor. All of these lenses are valid. Or invalid, depending on how you see it.
name: Wisdom Stone
